reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, well-made, and comfortable, particularly noting it's suitable for hot climates and can be worn without a bra. The dress is flattering, showing off shapes perfectly and making customers look curvy, and comes in multiple colors. While some it fits nicely, others mention sizing issues, and opinions are mixed about the length, with some noting it's longer in the back than in the front. The dress is criticized for being see-through, especially along the bottom. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Buy This :D
items.body: 5'2", 140 lbs, 36DD. I ordered the sz L in Green and it's beautiful and fits me well. The shade of Green is Emerald. The drawstring at the hips allows for a low back drape or you can cinch it up. I am short waisted and so I needed to wear it higher in order my panties not show. The tube-top part is very stretchy BUT it barely came around to cover the sides of my boobs. Since the fabric is thin, I wore silicone nipple covers which were amazing. The halter tie is of attached thin straps so you can use them or tuck them in and go strapless. Because I'm short, I knew I'd need to shrink the dress after trying it on out of the bag. It's made of Rayon which will shrink up after a wash but easily comes back to size with steaming. I choose to put my dress in the dryer after the water wash and it shrank enough to wear with flats and still graze the floor. Had I not washed and dried the dress, it would have been too long to not drag on me (5'2") and I don't think heels would have been enough. I ordered the sz L to prepare for the length shrinkage. I got so many compliments on this dress that I've ordered other colors. I'm a huge Free People clothing fan and this 'dupe is an amazing dupe. Read more
items.author: Bee

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and flattering dress!
items.body: This dress is absolutely gorgeous â€” the green color is rich and vibrant, and the fabric flows beautifully. Thereâ€™s a lot of material, so it moves really nicely and has an elegant, slightly sexy look. I love that itâ€™s fully adjustable, making it easy to customize for comfort and style. I ordered a small, and the fit was just right. It looked amazing in photos and made me feel confident and feminine. Read more
items.author: JaneyB

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Light and flowy but odd in back
items.body: Back of dress looks odd because since it has the ruffly texture on the horizontal straps, if just makes it look bunches up there. Skirt is super flowy and fun though. LOVE the skirt. For sizing, I got the XL and I think it is still a bit on the small side for me, but was the largest size offered. For reference I am 5'6", 230 lbs, waist 40, hips 46. Specifically tight in the breast area. I wear 38C. Waist is easy to fit because there's a tie in the back for the waist that I cinched up fairly well so don't worry too much about that part fitting. It's definitely adjustable. Read more
items.author: Savannah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful - yet a bit sheer
items.body: I absolutely adore this dress. First off, I didn't think the 36Ds would have enough fabric, but they did. It's not the most flattering dress for me, it hits a bit above my waist which annoys me. 5'9" and it was long enough to tuck up in to my belt for a little breeze. It's so light and flowy and magical, I just love it and how I feel in it. I also have a wide low-back scar, and the ties adjusted enough so it wouldn't dip super low and show. It'd probably be cuter if it was let down just a bit in the back. Be aware that it's pretty see-through, because I was not, and spent an entire day at the Medieval Faire basically with my high beams out in the right light, but.... ðŸ¤·â€â™€ï¸ Worth it lol. Seems to be great quality and I was nice and cool in the 90* weather. My fiancÃ© didn't notice it was a little sheer (indoor lighting before I left), but loves it and said it's a keeper lol. In the future I may pair it with a lace tube top or some nip covers, but.... It's not offensively obvious in black. If I got any lighter color, I'd absolutely have a decency issue. You can see the green of the trees through the skirt in a couple photos, so you'd see the pink of my ladies in a lighter shade for sure ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚. I thought about this one for like over a year before giving it a chance... If you have prime imo go for it. OH, and it smelled a little like black dye (vinegar - ish) at first, but aired out fine and I sprayed perfume. Read more
items.author: SrvivlKittsn

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Flowy dress for small chests
items.body: Beautiful but NOT for big boobs. I wish there was more support. The tie around the neck has to be painfully tight for any kind of support, but altogether not worth it. Also came very wrinkled. Read more
items.author: brittanyeorr

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars This dress is a need
items.body: This dress is adorable! So comfortable, easy to wash, doesn't wrinkle, the size is very inclusive as the waste cinch can go very wide to very small. It's versatile (I wear it as a skirt also) and the quality is amazing. I want it in every color Read more
items.author: Tyler

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy Dress
items.body: I have been seeing this dress all over social media and I was looking for a cute flowy dress and this kept popping up so I took a chance and bought it. I actually stepped out my comfort zone when I picked the color my go to are usually black or pink but I got wine red and ooohlalala the color against my skin is beautiful. Dress is long I am 5â€™2 which is okay with me I donâ€™t mind lifting it while I walk. Definitely a great dress and itâ€™s cozy and the way it hugs my curves love it!! Read more
items.author: Elana

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Flowy, flattering, and perfect for summer!
items.body: This dress is SO CUTE with great length. I was a little nervous because it looks shorter (above ankle length) on some of the models and review photos, but it did dust the floor when I was barefoot, so I was happy about that. The color looks great, but my only gripe there is that the color leached a little after a wash and when attempting to steam out the persistent wrinkles this fabric holds on to. My gripes are little, and overall I really liked the fit and the look. It was comfortable, flown, and flattering. I'd even buy this in more colors. I love that it can be a very casual summer dress, but you're able to dress it up too! Read more
items.author: Rikki

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Apricot, Army Green, Black, Orange, Aquablue, Plum#1, Lavender, Beige, Brightgreen, Royal Blue, Mauve, Turquoise, Dusty Purple. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
